title: Client crashing all the time
body: Im tired of this client crashing.  i have been playing LoL for a long time now and it never has done this.  keeps crashing when im in promos and giving a loss over something i cant control. FIX IT!!!!

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more details regarding where *exactly* it's crashing? Any error messages or specific behavior your notice when this happens?
